archimate:Folder.name: Gain Commitment to Marketing Strategy
archimate:Folder.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Gain enterprise commitment to the market strategy and segmentation Extended Description The Gain Commitment to Market Strategy processes gain enterprise commitment to the market strategy and segmentation. These processes include all aspects of identification of stakeholders and negotiation to gain stakeholder approval.
